abstract: Here’s something that might provide a bit of solace for individual investors watching their value of the portfolios plunging: Warren E. Buffett is losing lots of money, too. So are Kirk Kerkorian, Carl C. Icahn and Sumner Redstone.
lead_paragraph: Here’s something that might provide a bit of solace for individual investors watching their value of the portfolios plunging: Warren E. Buffett is losing lots of money, too. So are Kirk Kerkorian, Carl C. Icahn and Sumner Redstone.

headline.main: Even Savvy Investors Are Feeling the Pain
